title: WHO conference explores AI's role in validating traditional medicine
description: NEW DELHI — The World Health Organization opens a major conference on traditional medicine on Wednesday, arguing that new technologies, including artificial intelligence, can bring scientific scrutiny to centuries-old healing practices.
content:

title: Agrilever, Tomorrow.io utilize AI-powered weather forecasting for farmers
description: AGRILEVER has partnered with global weather intelligence leader Tomorrow.io to bring hyperlocal, artificial intelligence (AI)-powered forecasting solutions to the country’s agricultural sector.
content:

title: Trump: A year of ruling by executive order
description: To promote artificial intelligence (AI), fight “woke” culture and even increase the water flow of showers, Trump has churned out executive orders at a rate unprecedented since World War II, according to an Agence France-Presse (AFP) analysis.
content: PARIS — With a stroke of his favorite black pen, Donald Trump has signed what should become his 221st executive order since January — a figure that exceeds the number in his entire first term, as he forges ahead with one of the biggest displays of Am... [4705 chars]

description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google is rolling out a more efficient and affordable version of its most powerful artificial intelligence model across its products, building on the company’s momentum after the successful launch of Gemini 3.

title: ASCI charts AI-ready regulatory roadmap for Indian advertising
description: The Advertising Standards Council of India (ASCI) is preparing for the next phase of artificial intelligence-led change in advertising, even as it strengthens regulatory oversight to ensure consumer trust keeps pace with innovation, CEO and Secretary General Manisha Kapoor said.

title: Eye On Illinois: After BIPA missteps, can lawmakers get AI regulations correct on the first try?
description: As with facial scans and voice recognition, technology falling under the blanket descriptor of “artificial intelligence” is advancing far more rapidly that any legislation could hope to match.
content:
When protecting their people, lawmakers might also consider the value of their own time.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Unlocking Traditional Medicine's Potential with AI and Genomics
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
